overview: A video-diary of Morris Moshe (Momo) before and after a failed attempt at suicide. After a failed attempt at suicide Morris Moshe (Momo) found himself clinically dead for 3 minutes and 17 seconds. When he suddenly regained consciousness his first words were: "Why Africa? Because it's neither South nor West. Nor North nor East... It's above the Earth." What did Momo mean? And where was he all this time?
title: Ecce Momo!
